scripts.build-dev: mkdir -p prod && cp dev/index.html prod/ && spago bundle-app --to prod/index.js && parcel build prod/index.html --public-url /app/
scripts.build-prod: mkdir -p prod && cp dev/index.html prod/ && rm -rf dist && spago bundle-app --to prod/index.js && parcel build prod/index.html --public-url /app/
